articles.author: Spencer Kimball
articles.title: LNG stocks jump after European Union agrees to massive U.S. energy purchases - CNBC
articles.description: The energy purchases are a key component of a trade deal struck between the European Union and the U.S. over the weekend.
articles.content:
Shares of liquified natural gas, or LNG, companies jumped Monday after the European Union agreed to purchase $750 billion of energy from the U.S.
LNG exporters Cheniere and Venture Global were up ab… [+945 chars]
